FlipCam //For Permission No Permission Unavailability of permissions will render FlipCam not to function correctly.

 Please reopen the application or go to Settings, if you wish to grant permission. EXIT /Camera/ / FC_VID_ FC_IMG_ .mp4 .jpeg .jpg yyyy-MM-dd-HH-mm-ss KB MB GB 00 : 00 : 00 0 MB VIDEO PHOTO Photo Video MODE VIDEO SAVED IMAGE SAVED "image/jpeg" "video/mp4" No Photos or Videos Delete Media Load Media Do you want to delete the %1$s? There seems to be no Internet Connection. Please check your connection, or enable Wi-Fi and try again. OK DELETE CANCEL Share Media Upload to Facebook Connection Failure There are no installed apps that can share your %1$s.

FlipCam can share to Facebook without the app. Would you like to share? The media will be uploaded to Facebook CONTINUE Media queued for upload. Please check notification bar for status. YOU HAVE BEEN LOGGED OUT OF FACEBOOK LOGOUT OF FACEBOOK Permission for Facebook WhatsApp not available WhatsApp needs to be installed to be able to share Photos/Videos to another WhatsApp contact. Upload to Facebook FlipCam requires you to login to Facebook to request below permission(s) to upload Photos/Videos: You have an option to logout before you upload. publish_actions LOGIN TO FACEBOOK NOT NOW Facebook WhatsApp 308890512940081 fb308890512940081 FlipCam Media Upload Service Google Drive Upload Service Dropbox Upload Service No internet connection. Upload Canceled. File %1$s has been deleted or moved. %1$s Uploaded. %1$s Upload Completed Successfully.
File %2$s %1$s upload in progress %1$s queued for upload. 
 File %2$s %1$s queued for upload. %1$s queued for upload.
Check status bar notification for status. Finishing Upload. Upload Interrupted Upload in Progress Uploading to %1$s Auto Upload in Progress %1$s Upload Completed Possible Connection Loss.
Retry for %1$d secs (%2$d).... Possible Connection Loss. Retrying... com.whatsapp com.facebook.katana FlipCam Settings Save Media in Phone Memory SD Card Phone Memory Limit Warning Threshold : %1$s Disabled The amount of phone memory below which you would like a warning. Auto Upload To Cloud Google Drive Dropbox Show Memory Consumed For Video Show how much memory is being consumed by the current video recording, in the recording window. Enable Shutter Sound Enable shutter sound of camera when clicking photos.

May not be supported on some devices. No Audio for Video AUDIO ENABLED FOR VIDEO AUDIO DISABLED FOR VIDEO OK CANCEL Phone Memory Limit Warning If the amount of available phone memory is below this limit, FlipCam will give you a warning message before you start to shoot a video/photo. Phone Memory Threshold Threshold value should be
 greater than 0 Please enter a number greater than 0 Phone memory threshold set to %1$s %2$s. Disable Threshold Check The threshold entered is the same or more than the internal storage (%1$s %2$s) of your phone. Please enter a lower value. The threshold value cannot be lower than %1$s. Please enter a higher value. Sign in to %1$s CONTINUE NOT NOW This option enables you to automatically upload any photos/videos created from now, onto the cloud.

User Sign in required for the cloud service, to which the user is opting to upload. Sign In failed either due to Internet connection issue or cancellation by user. Signed out of %1$s.

Auto upload has been disabled. Name of the upload folder in %1$s. Create Upload Folder CREATE CANCEL Incorrect characters in folder name. Please try again. Folder Name is empty. Please give a folder name. Folder %1$s Created Successfully. Error creating folder in %1$s. Please check your internet connection and try again. We need the google accounts info to check if you have already signed in. FlipCam would like to read your contacts, only to check if you have already signed in to your Google Account. 

This is necessary to be able to auto upload to Google Drive.

Click Yes to give permission. Account Check Permission YES NO FlipCam will now auto upload your photos/videos onto this folder in %1$s.

Please check your notifications for upload status. FlipCam will now auto upload your photos/videos onto %1$s folder in %2$s.

Please check your notifications for upload status. Fetching Google Account information in your phone for signing into %1$s.

Please Wait... Redirecting to Dropbox Website... Creating folder in %1$s... Sign In to %1$s Total Phone Memory Free Memory Phone Memory Status Folder not created in Google Drive. Please try again. Folder %1$s in %2$s may have been trashed or moved. Please restore it.
If permanently removed, please re-enable auto upload in Settings. Upload Folder error User needs to Sign in to upload to Google Drive.
Please Sign in to Google Account under Android Settings. Google Drive SignIn Error Timed out attempting to upload the file. Please try again later. Timed out error Timed out attempting to retrieve folder info. Please try again later. %1$s Auto Upload Error Auto Upload Enabled Auto Upload Disabled Do you want to continue? Upload Folder The below folder was found to be earlier created using FlipCam: Checking for earlier created folder in %1$s using FlipCam.

If not, one will be created now. Checking for earlier created subfolder inside FlipCam folder in user's %1$s account. Upload Folder Moved/Deleted The earlier created folder %1$s in Dropbox has been moved/deleted.

Setting upload folder as FlipCam... 169uf2hzn1n0iov Dropbox Upload Folder FlipCam Create a subfolder inside FlipCam for my uploads. Folder name has invalid special characters. Please try again. User is not signed in, or, FlipCam does not have access to its own folder. Please try again later. Access revoked for main folder FlipCam and its subfolders in Dropbox.

Auto upload has been disabled. FlipCam requires access to its own folder Apps -> FlipCam, in your DropBox account.

You will need to Sign in if not done so earlier. 

Do you want to continue? Remove Media Deleting File... Loading Media... Share Photo with Share Video with Phone Memory Limit Exceeded The available Phone Memory is below the threshold of %1$s.

Click OK to continue. The available Phone Memory is below %1$s.

You need to free some space before you can continue to record video/photo. Minimum Threshold Check disabled. Please go to Settings to enable. SD Card Detected SD Card has been detected. Files will be stored in below location.

%1$s

NOTE: If the application is uninstalled, you will lose the files in above location. Gallery will refresh to show SD Card media contents that were created by FlipCam. SD Card does not contain media or folder created by FlipCam. SD Card Not Detected SD Card Removed No SD Card has been detected.

Please insert an SD Card and try again. SD Card has been removed.

Default storage location is now Phone Memory. SD Card has been removed.

Gallery will now show media only from Phone Memory. //For SD Card Removed and Empty Messages FlipCam Folder Does Not Exist FlipCam folder (com.flipcam) does not exist in SD Card. FlipCam Folder Empty FlipCam folder (com.flipcam) is empty in SD Card.
SD Card has been removed.

Gallery will now show media only from Phone Memory. 

Default storage location is now Phone Memory. No SD Card has been detected.

Please insert an SD Card and try again. 

Default storage location is now Phone Memory. Unable to save video. SD Card has been removed.

Default storage location is now Phone Memory. SD Card Write Error Unable to write onto SD Card. Please verify that SD Card is not Read-only. FlipCam Gallery %1$d Photos, %2$d Videos com.flipcam.data Flash Mode %1$s not supported by this camera. Front facing camera not available in this device. FlipCam Icon Placeholder Icon Upload Folder Dropbox Icon Brightness Icon Flash On Settings No Photos/Videos Play inside circle Delete Photo/Video Share Photo/Video Display Media Info Play Video Navigate to Memory Threshold Activity Folder Created Successfully. Camera Preview Photo/Video Thumbnail Switch Camera Camera Click Switch to Video Captured Image Record Video Switch to Photo Google Drive Icon Warning Message Photo substitute Zoom not supported for this camera. Unable to delete file Torch On Off Auto Video Resolutions Set the video recording resolution for the camera. HIGH MEDIUM LOW Video Player Choose a player to playback videos. FlipCam Video Player FlipCam will use your favorite media player to play videos.

 This can be changed in Video Settings. No External Video Players found.
FlipCam will use internal player. 4K Video recording will be supported in a later version. Do not Show Again Favorite Video Player CLOSE External Video Player Rear Camera Photo Resolutions Front Camera Photo Resolutions Photo Options Video Options Feedback Please provide your feedback on any issues you faced with this application, or how the FlipCam application can be enhanced. Your feedback is valuable and will be kept confidential. SEND FEEDBACK Please enter a feedback. Thank you for your feedback. Sending Feedback... Feedback... Slide View BRIGHTNESS %1$s X %2$s Back Camera Resolution Front Camera Resolution Set the photo resolution for the rear camera. Set the photo resolution for the front camera. Photo Settings Video Settings FLASH Memory Consumed RECORDING PAUSED Click START TIMER to start the timer for Front Facing Camera. START TIMER CANCEL TIMER Front Camera Timer Enable Front Camera Timer. Timer Duration Set the front camera timer duration (in seconds). Media Location Phone Folder SD Card Folder Both Folder Media Source Close Button PHONE SD CARD ALL Media Folder LOCATION //Media Info %1$s INFO NAME : PATH : SIZE : DATE CREATED : DIMENSION : CLOSE dd MMMM yyyy HH:mm:ss //Nokia 7.1 model Nokia 7.1 //Labels for User Manual FlipCam User Manual Video Screen //Use same for screen 2 and 3 Video Recording Screen Video Recording Pause Screen Photo Screen Settings Screen Settings Screen //Use same for screen 8 and 9 Media Screen //Use for screen 10 Media Location Screen GridView Screen Welcome to FlipCam User Manual WELCOME TO FLIPCAM!

 THIS IS A USER MANUAL TO HELP YOU
 NAVIGATE AND USE THE APP.

 SWIPE LEFT FOR MORE DETAILS.
Enjoy FlipCam!! Please click on back button if you would like to exit the User Manual. Click on back button to exit the User Manual. ENJOY THE APP. KEEP FLIPPING TO CREATE MORE EXCITING VIDEOS!!

 YOU CAN REVISIT THIS USER MANUAL BY CLICKING ON SETTINGS ICON
IN THE PHOTO OR VIDEO RECORDING SCREEN AND CHOOSING USER MANUAL OPTION. TO REVISIT THE USER MANUAL, CLICK ON SETTINGS ICON IN THE PHOTO OR VIDEO RECORDING SCREEN AND CHOOSE USER MANUAL OPTION. Swipe Left to go to next screen. Swipe Right to go to previous screen.
